Life’s complex. Loyalty programs are outdated. Investing is daunting.
Loyalty isn’t rewarding like it used to be. We walk around with memberships of 5 or 10 loyalty programs, maybe more, but usually we just accumulate points we hardly ever redeem. We don’t invest soon enough in life or don’t know how to get started, and then regret it. But it’s never too late to get started.
Investing just became as easy as Pie!
Shop at hundreds of great brands you know and love, earn rewards on your purchases, and we’ll automatically convert those rewards to investments in your chosen investment plan.
We’re excited to be making life simpler and more rewarding. We’re proud of the difference we’ll make together. We consciously support Australian businesses. Spending within the Pie Rewards community means you will too. Wealth-generation for a generation!
1. JOIN FOR FREE
Download the app and sign up, it’s easy.
2. CHOOSE YOUR INVESTMENT PLAN
The app will help you to choose a core investment plan that best suits your risk appetite.
If you want to, you can complement your core plan with satellite investments in Big Tech or Ethical & Sustainability funds.
3. SPEND to EARN and INVEST – TODAY and EVERY DAY
Link an eligible credit or debit card, then shop on our app, in-store or online using the Pie Rewards browser extension.
Do your everyday shopping – and special occasion shopping too – at over 700 of your favourite brands to earn cashback rewards.
Pie Rewards automatically converts the rewards you earn for your shopping loyalty into investments in your chosen investment plan.
4. TRACK YOUR PORTFOLIO IN THE APP
You can see your transaction history and track investments in your portfolio over time. You can withdraw from your investment portfolio into your bank account at any time.
5. STAY IN THE KNOW
As a Pie Rewards member, you can choose to be notified in the app about special offers, campaigns and new brands as we bring them into the Pie Rewards network. We’re working to expand our partnerships, offers and app features and you’ll be the first to know!
QUESTIONS?
Get in touch at support@pierewards.com.au
